text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Hillary Chenonge ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Markos Geneti Guteta ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Gebre-Egziabher Gebremariam ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 5000 metres
